title: Portfolio
description: This very site is a portfolio project for DSC 106 at UCSD. It showcases various web development skills including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON data handling.

title: Platzi-pipline
description: Ongoing project to build a data pipeline that extracts, transforms, and loads data from various sources into a centralized data warehouse for analysis and reporting.

title: Recipe ratings from food.com
description: A data analysis projject that involves scraping recipe ratings from food.com, cleaning the data, and performing exploratory data analysis to uncover trends and insights about popular recipes. Project for DSC 80 at UCSD.

title: Trail Difficulty Classification
description: A machine learning project that classifies hiking trail difficulties based on various features such as elevation gain, distance, and terrain type. Utilizes algorithms like decision trees and random forests to predict trail difficulty levels. Group project for COGS 108 at UCSD

title: Gym Tracker App
description: Paused. A mobile application designed to help users track their gym workouts, set fitness goals, and monitor progress over time. Features include exercise logging, workout plans, and performance analytics. Personal project.

title: Bill Splitter App
description: Paused. A web application that allows users to easily split bills among friends or roommates. Users can input expenses, assign them to individuals, and calculate each person's share, including tips and taxes. Personal project.

title: Image Alteration and Classification
description: A computer vision project that involves altering images using various filters and transformations, followed by classifying the altered images using convolutional neural networks (CNNs). The project aims to explore the effects of image alterations on classification accuracy. Project for DSC 20
